phrases: Fairy Tail...
Natsu...san?
You came here to pick a fight with Master?
That is suicidal!
Fro thinks so, too...
Are you serious, kid?
Anybody who does not think of their comrades as comrades
is on my list!
Is he talking about Yukino?
That is got nothing to do with you!
Who would storm in here over something like that?!
I do not know what you are talking about,
but I suppose you have got your reasons.
You do not know what I am talkin' about?!
Dobengal.
Deal with him.
Yes, sir!
You are avoiding me?
A guild soldier like you needs 100 more years of experience.
If you want a shot at the top, you will have to prove yourself.
Show me what you can do.
Pandemonium!
Fight me!
You are not getting near the master!
I, Dobengal, am not taking part in the Grand Magic Games,
but when it comes to skill, I am just as strong as any of the participants here.
I am going to show you the power of Sabertooth!
A smokescreen, huh?
You do not know who you are messing with.
You should withdraw immediately.
Get out!
Outta my way!
My beef are not with you!
I do not believe it...
Dobengal's down?!
He is one of the top ten strongest wizards in our guild!
Master, let me...
Do not do a thing.
Kid, there are not any like you in my guild.
Amusing.
Is that all...
Firing Hammer...
Minerva!
My lady!
Shall we end this evening's entertainment here?
Minerva, I did not ask you to step in...
Of course,
if this had continued, you would have won, Father.
Father?
However, the world cares about appearances.
Even though this one came here and attacked you,
if the master of Sabertooth annihilated a participant in the Grand Magic Games,
it would cause difficulty for all of us.
I will tell ya one thing... if anybody's gettin' wiped out, it is him!
My father has somewhat warmed to this battle,
but cannot back down in front of his subordinates.
What do you think?
Will you allow us to save face?
If you do, I will return this kitten to you unharmed.
Happy!
I am sorry, Natsu!
Dammit!
You have incapacitated several of our people,
but we are willing to overlook this incident.
In exchange, I am asking you to behave in a mature fashion.
Natsu!
I am sorry!
They caught me at the entrance!
It is okay, Happy.
It is my fault for leaving you behind.
Natsu!
Let us go.
Aye!
That kid's got grit.
We will settle this at the Grand Magic Games.
To our hearts' content.
We are not going to lose to the likes of you.
In fact, you will not be able to keep up with us.
If you call yourself a guild, take care of your comrades.
That is all I wanted to say.
Comrades...
We do not have that kind of bond in our guild.
Y-You are that strong,
Natsu Dragneel?!
Hey!
I am going to compete tomorrow!
I cannot just let him get away with this carnage!
You mean you are going to unleash the power of Black Lightning, right?
Certainly, this was rather one-sided carnage,
but without something like this, we would have lost our spark.
Anyway, we need someone to replace Yukino.
I think I will get in on the fun.
You fought Sabertooth?!
Actually, I wanted to mix it up with'them even more...
Too bad it ended right as I was gettin' fired up.
I am sorry, Natsu!
It is my fault, for getting caught!
What are you talking about?!
We are lucky it ended the way it did!
That is right!
If one of their team members had been injured,
we might have been disqualified!
Come to think of it, that Minerva chick was sayin' something like that.
You are incredibly stupid!
Use your head a little!
Exactly!
Pour it on, Gray!
Read him the riot act!
If you were going to take the fight to them, you should have invited me!
It is not fair, you getting to have all the fun!
You are missing the point!
Just because you are frustrated from losing a match,
there is nothing admirable about getting payback in a fight outside the arena.
That is not what it is about!
I just wanted to deliver a message to that Rufus bastard...
I am not going to lose next time!
Anyway, I am not lettin' those jerks off the hook.
A comrade's someone who is got your back and you got theirs...
Being strict is one thing,
but humiliating a girl and then kicking her out, that is as low as you can go!
That Yukino girl,
even after being abused like that, she came to see me...
I wonder where she is now...
I am worried.
She did say she has nowhere to go...
Dammit!
I am still seething!
I think I will go back there an' fight some more!
Alright!
Count me in!
You cannot do that!
Cannot you just settle it at the tournament?!
Although now that you have riled up Sabertooth,
from tomorrow on, they will probably go even harder on us in the matches!
It does not matter which guild they are in,
all wizards have their own feelings.
Move it!
Let us go!
Stop it, I said!
Listen, you two...
Would you cut it out?!
Yes, madam!
Hey, did you hear?
About last night, right?!
What are you talking about?
Apparently, somebody attacked Sabertooth's inn!
What kind of fool would pick a fight with Saber?!
Beats me!
Well, brawls happen outside the arena every year, right?
This is a festival, so they should take it public!
Natsu-sama...?
A guild that makes its family members cry are not no guild at all!
Do not tell me he did it for...
We are at the halfway point in the Grand Magic Games.
The beginning of the third day!
I wonder what kind of passionate dramas we will see today?
Our guest today
is Lahar-san, from the Magic Council.
It is been a long time, has not it?
Thank you for this opportunity.
Lahar-san, you are the Captain of the Enforcement and Detention Corps...
Yes.
I will not stand for any shenanigans during the tournament.
That is the captain for you.
He never forgets his duties.
Damn you, Lahar...
Why did you make me come here?
A guest of the Grand Magic Games?!
You?
I have no reason to decline.
Come with me, Doranbolt.
No, I...
You want to see Fairy Tail alive and well, do not you?
Do not you wonder about them?
How could I not?
Still, the way I am now...
Are you still hung up on what happened seven years ago?
About what you perceive of as abandoning Fairy Tail?
They are looking forward.
The only one who is dragged down by the past is you.
Oh, no!
The match is starting!
It is your fault!
You just had to get a fish-kebab from that food stand!
It smelled so good, I could not help myself!
Whatever, let us just hurry!
I am going to announce the competition for this, the third day of the Games!
The name of the event...
What does pandemonium mean?
It is an abode of demons.
Like a building where lots of demons lurk...
I wonder if they are doing a haunted house...
They are walking down a dark path and suddenly...
I do not think I like pandemonium...
I-I am scared, too!
Even though you are a ghost yourself?!
There will be one participant from each guild.
Please choose your representative!
I will do it!
I got to continue what I started last night!
You do not get to decide all by yourself!
If it is a revenge match, I want to do it, too!
No.
I will go.
You going out there may only make things more complicated.
I agree!
Good luck, Erza!
Fight!
Let me do it!
Would you calm down?!
I will participate for B Team.
Wait a second!
It is about time that I get to do something!
Cana, how could you go, when you are a reserve member?
What happened to Mystogan?
Juvia has not seen him yet today...
With the guest commentator being a member of the Council,
I should be able to participate, right?
That is true...
If Er-chan is going to do this, let me go too, Kagura-chan!
I will allow it.
I am not going to lose, Er-chan!
Right!
I hate Jellal, too...
He used us...
I will never forgive him...
I will never forgive him!
I have to focus!
From Mermaid
Heel, it looks like Millianna is taking the field!
That girl!
Millianna...
She is the one who was wearing the hood.
I did not know she was in a guild.
Do not because trouble in front of the Council, Obra.
I will be the rep for Pegasus.
Like I said last night, I am participating in this one.
I will use my Black Lightning to blast them all to smithereens.
Even though we do not know what kind of competition it is going to be?
Do what you want.
If Natsu Dragneel is not going to be in it, I do not care what happens.
Jura-san is going to do it?
On Obaba's orders, so we cannot do anything about it.
My sock...
Just buy a new one!
Count on me.
All of the participants have been selected!
From Sabertooth, Orga!
From Lamia Scale, Jura!
From Blue Pegasus, Hibiki!
From Raven Tail, Obra!
From Mermaid Heel, Millianna!
From Quatro Puppy, Novali!
From Fairy Tail A, Erza!
From Fairy Tail B, Cana!
These are our eight competitors!
What is that?!
Wow...
Begin analysis.
Pandemonium, a temple haunted by evil monsters!
It is huge!
Haunted by monsters, he says?
That is the idea-kabo.
There are 100 monsters inside this temple.
That being said, they are actually magical manifestations that we created,
so everyone can relax.
There is no danger of you being attacked.
The monsters are D, C, B, A, S!
Those are the five levels of battle power the monsters are divided into.
This is how it breaks down.
Incidentally...
Ones like these
and ones even stronger, 100 of them wandering around the temple...
That is Pandemonium-kabo!
Even though he says they are just magical manifestations,
if you get attacked by them, you are hurt for real, right?
Will Erza and Cana be okay?
I would like to think that those two will be alright, but...
This is a really extravagant competition, do not you think?
Though it feels like they may be going a little too far...
Please note that as the class of the monsters goes up,
their fighting strength increases exponentially.
The S-class monster is so strong that there is no guarantee
even one of the 10 Great Wizard Saints can defeat it-kabo.
In order, each of you will choose the number of monsters to battle.
It is called your right to challenge.
Right to challenge?
For example, if you choose three monsters,
three of them will appear inside the temple.
The person who chooses them enters the temple alone.
If the player successfully destroys them, he or she gets three points.
The next player then has the right to challenge up to 97 of the remaining monsters.
And so on and so on,
until there are zero monsters left!
Alternatively, if everyone runs out of magic power, the game is over at that point.
It is like a counting game.
That is right!
Assessing the situation when your turn comes around becomes important!
However, as I mentioned before,
the monsters are ranked.
Whether the player uses their right to challenge one or five,
the monsters appear randomly.
In other words, you need a strategy to avoid running into the S-class monster, right?
If it is random, having a strategy like that will not do you any good.
Not true.
Between probability theory and my Archive,
strategy will work to some extent.
Irrespective of the monster's rank,
you will get one point for each monster you destroy.
Once you enter the temple, you cannot exit until you have succeeded.
What happens if we go down while inside the temple?
The number of points you have earned during your turn stays as is,
but the number of destroys you have had that turn goes to zero, and you are out.
Then it is bad to get too greedy.
But if you only go with one monster per turn, you will fall behind the others.
And you also have to consider how much magic you will recover before it is your next turn.
This is surprisingly difficult, huh?
Well, let us see what happens...
Alright, let us decide on the order.
Please draw your lots.
Number one!
You are lucky!
It will go back around to being your turn the most.
I got number eight...
With this competition,
I thought winning or losing all depended on the luck of the draw...
Luck of the draw?
I do not know about that...
More than the order of battle,
pacing yourself and situational judgment are important in this game.
No.
This is not a game anymore.
All 100 will be my opponents!
I exercise my right to challenge...
100 monsters all by herself, she says!
Erza really is scary!
It is like Erza is the one who is the monster!
Does she actually have all that armor?!
Heaven's Wheel Armor, Black Wing, Flame Empress, Sea Empress,
Flight, Adamantine, Giant, Lightning Empress...
I bet she has, like, Red Ogre Armor and Hag Armor, too!
She is going to get mad at you again!
Next time: 100 to 1!
But really, this is supposed to be a team competition, right?
Ah, this is fine.
After all, it is Erza!
